responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "9E55A487441B45B9D4F4F2AA936FE401", "As you read the Rite of Purification, the scroll trembles in your hands, its runes flickering with pale light. A cold breeze sweeps through the air, causing the surrounding shadows to lengthen. The paper's edges curl slightly, as if reacting to the incantation. The Horn of the Great Herd begins to hum, a low, resonant vibration that grows in intensity. A faint, eerie glow envelops the Horn as the surrounding air shimmers, thickening with the presence of an unseen force.")
name: NOT USED_Response
